description:
I ran the install and then opened up a terminal window, typed feh, got 
Command 'feh' not found, but can be installed with:
sudo apt install feh
Soooo, it looks like this package does not install this app.

You should run this from terminal using /snap/bin/feh-lreenaers.feh

And /snap/bin/feh-lreenaers.feh -v
feh version 2.18.3

Outdated software are unsafe.

https://github.com/derf/feh/issues/505 e.g. is fixed in 3.6.1, you ship 2.18.3.
summary: hard to run, four years behind upstream
